Tips for #startups:

1. State the problem & solution
2. For websites, use white space w/ two-three colors
3. Create a short video 
4. Remove industry jargon & company accolades 
5. Use less text 
5. Add social media icons and a CTA
6. Use storytelling
7. Focus on your audience

If you have mastered focusing skill, you are better than most people!!
